root.name: fptoi()

example.code:
int var1 = 50; int var1_fp = itofp(var1); // Sets var1_fp to 50.0 int var2_fp = (int) (0.5f * ONE); // Sets var2_fp to 0.5
int result_fp = mul(var1_fp, var2_fp); // Sets result_fp to 25.0
int result = fptoi(result_fp); // Sets result to 25

root.description: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the specified fixed point value. Use this function to convert a fixed point value into a normal integer for use in other functions, such as drawing functions.
